comment._content: The Bain photographers really had a thing for blown bridges, didn't they?

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original Agence Meurisse photo at Gallica site, pub. date 1914, with caption: "Compiègne : le pont de pierre détruit par le Génie Français " Compiègne: the stone bridge destroyed by French engineering gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041779h

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Artolog:  Thank you for finding the matching image on the Gallica site. We will add more details when we update.
